summary.p: Converts a given value to a 16-bit unsigned integer.

examples.p: The following shows TO_UINT16 results for some input data:
examples.sampleCode: SELECT 'The TO_UINT16 result of value ''1'' is: ' AS Input, TO_UINT16('1') AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_UINT16 result of value 32000.999 is: ' AS Input, TO_UINT16(32000.999) AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_UINT16 result of value 32001.999 is: ' AS Input, TO_UINT16(32001.999) AS Value
